queries.name: ifnull & coalesce
queries.query: select plain_int_0, plain_string_0, ifnull(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as mul, coalesce(plain_float_0, plain_float_1, 1.0) as cl from carol_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_int_0, plain_string_0, ifnull(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as mul, coalesce(plain_float_0, plain_float_1, 1.0) as cl from carol.tbl_1;

queries.name: apply in
queries.query: select plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_1) as tt, plain_int_0 not in (select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_1) as ff from carol_tbl_0
queries.mysql_query: select plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_1) as tt, plain_int_0 not in (select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_1) as ff from carol.tbl_0

queries.name: where in subquery
queries.query: select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_0 as carol where plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_1)
queries.mysql_query: select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_0 where plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_1)

queries.name: where in subquery
queries.query: select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_0 as carol where (plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol_tbl_1 as carol)) and plain_int_0 > 0
queries.mysql_query: select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_0 where (plain_int_0 in (select plain_int_0 from carol.tbl_1)) and plain_int_0 > 0

queries.name: date func (now, curdate)
queries.query: select plain_datetime_0 < now() as res1, plain_timestamp_0 < now() as res2, plain_datetime_0 < curdate() as res3, plain_timestamp_0 < curdate() as res4 from carol_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_datetime_0 < now() as res1, plain_timestamp_0 < now() as res2, plain_datetime_0 < curdate() as res3, plain_timestamp_0 < curdate() as res4 from carol.tbl_1;
